mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO UserByJiaYuan ( realUid, nickname, sex, age, marriage, height, education, localhost, image, randTag, randListTag, shortnote, matchCondition, helloUrl ) VALUES
( #{item.realUid}, #{item.nickName}, #{item.sex}, #{item.age}, #{item.marriage}, #{item.height}, #{item.education}, #{item.localhost}, #{item.image}, #{item.randTag}, #{item.randListTag}, #{item.shortnote}, #{item.matchCondition}, #{item.helloUrl} )
